page.title: 06THE AVERAGE BARNSTON CHILD
page.content:
These facts arose from writing "A day in the life of" a Barnston child.
51% watch{Breakfast Television. 100% of children have cereal or toast for{ breakfast. 23%{ read}before coming to school. 75% walk to school,12%{travel}by bus,13% come by car. 98% have a{bicycle.}53% have a{pet. 100% watch{T.V.}in the evening. 58% have another T.V.where they can watch programmes different from the rest of the family. 43% have a{video recorder}at home. 53% have a{computer}at home. 75% have their{evening meal}with both parents,15% with their mother and 5% have their meal on their own. 28% did{homework}for their parents. 78% had their{own bedroom}whilst the rest shared with a brother or sister.
